lenders.name: Kim & Hayden
lenders.loan_because:
I think it's important to give a hand up, particularly to other women (and other parents), whenever we can. It's only by sheer, dumb luck that my family was born where we were and have had some of the opportunities that we have. It's our responsibility to share that good fortune as much as we can.

For the past six years, my daughter, Hayden, has helped me choose who we loan money to. She favours mums with kids in primary school and shorter loan terms, so we can relend faster (smart kid!). She is developing a social conscience at a very early age!
lenders.occupational_info: I work in corporate sponsorship. I assist companies to make good decisions about how to spend their money. I also write books and teach companies how to spend their sponsorship money wisely, as well as teaching organisations how to raise money.

lenders.name: Village School Foundation
lenders.loan_because: As human beings we are constantly making choices every minute of every day either on a conscious or subconscious level.  With the choices that we make, comes the responsibility for accepting what we experience in life.  As children from poor villages of Viet Nam, did we choose poverty?  As inmates in the only maximum-security prison in Oregon, did we choose to be locked up?  In a world where children have no choices and where people made wrong choices collide, we’re here to keep hope alive.  We want to share with KIVA that with a little bit of hope the world can be a better place.  In prison we maybe – but imprisoned we are not.

lenders.occupational_info:
ADEN FOREVER 
We are middle school students at St. Lawrence School  near Montreal, Quebec. KIVA is our project which was begun to honour the memory of a young boy called ADEN ROACH who passed away several years ago at the age of 8 years old. Aden was a particularly good-hearted little boy, so we decided that KIVA was a good way to honour his memory.
We blog about KIVA and other things at:
http://allthingsquebec.wordpress.com/

If you're a teacher you may also be interested in my lesson plans . at:
www.kivapedia.org/index.php/Main_Page/Education


Evelyn Yvonne Theriault

lenders.occupational_info: Newstone International specializes in importing natural stone raw materials and finished products around the world. Materials are processed in China,India,Brazil, and Japan to be offered on our online store on Amazon.co.jp and Rakuten. Portion of our profit are either donated or loaned to association, such as MAC Tokyo, Red Cross, or cities of victims of 3.11 Tsunami.
